categories.name: Core Decision Engine
categories.summary: 4D coherence scoring, decision log, drift detection, memory graph, reflection, reconciliation, PRIME gate, DTE enforcement, and IRIS operator queries.

features.name: 4D Coherence Scorer
features.description: Computes unified 0-100 coherence score across policy adherence, outcome health, drift control, and memory completeness.

features.name: Coherence Gate
features.description: Composable enforcement gate combining 4D scorer + PRIME gate to produce GREEN/YELLOW/RED signal.

features.name: Decision Log Record (DLR)
features.description: Captures decision policy governance, action contracts used/blocked, verification requirements, and policy pack stamps.

features.name: Drift Signal Collector
features.description: Ingests and organizes drift events by type, severity, fingerprint, and recurrence; feeds audit loop and scoring.

features.name: Memory Graph (MG)
features.description: Provenance and recall graph storing episodes, actions, drift fingerprints, patches, and claims with sub-60s retrieval.

features.name: Reflection Session (RS)
features.description: Aggregates sealed episodes into learning summaries: outcome distribution, degradation frequency, verification pass rates.

features.name: Cross-Artifact Reconciler
features.description: Detects and proposes repairs for inconsistencies between DLR, drift signals, memory graph, and reflection summaries.

features.name: PRIME Threshold Gate
features.description: Converts LLM probability gradients into APPROVE/DEFER/ESCALATE verdicts using Truth-Reasoning-Memory invariants.

features.name: Decision Timing Envelope (DTE)
features.description: Validates hard timing constraints: deadline, stage budgets, feature TTL, hop/tool call limits.

features.name: IRIS Operator Query Engine
features.description: Resolves WHY/WHAT_CHANGED/WHAT_DRIFTED/RECALL/STATUS queries by walking MG claim topology and DLR rationale graph in <60s.

features.name: Coherence Auditor
features.description: Periodic cross-artifact consistency checks detecting orphan drift, missing episodes, policy stamp mismatches.

categories.name: FEEDS Event Surface
categories.summary: Federated Event Envelope Distribution Surface — event-driven pub/sub connecting governance primitives (TS, ALS, DLR, DS, CE) via file-based bus with manifest-first ingest, deterministic drift detection, authority validation, triage state machine, and canon versioning.

features.name: Event Envelope + Schemas
features.description: Canonical event envelope with 6 topic-specific payload schemas, SHA-256 payload hashing, two-phase validation (envelope then payload), and golden fixtures.

features.name: File-Bus Pub/Sub + DLQ
features.description: Atomic file-based publisher (temp+rename), poll-based subscriber with claim lifecycle (inbox→processing→ack), dead-letter queue with replay, and multi-worker safety via rename semantics.

features.name: Manifest-First Ingest Orchestrator
features.description: All-or-none packet ingest: manifest verification, SHA-256 hash checks, schema validation, per-topic extraction, atomic staging, and PROCESS_GAP drift emission on failure.

features.name: Authority Gate Consumer
features.description: Compares DLR action claims against ALS blessed claims; emits AUTHORITY_MISMATCH drift signal when unblessed claims detected.

features.name: Evidence Completeness Consumer
features.description: Cross-references DLR evidence refs against packet_index manifest; emits PROCESS_GAP drift signal on missing refs.

features.name: Drift Triage State Machine
features.description: SQLite-backed drift triage with enforced state transitions (NEW→TRIAGED→PATCH_PLANNED→PATCHED→VERIFIED), severity tracking, recurrence fingerprinting, and operator CLI.

features.name: Canon Store
features.description: Append-only SQLite canon store with semantic versioning, supersedes chain, domain filtering, version chain traversal, and cache invalidation event emission.

features.name: Claim Validator
features.description: Validates claims for contradictions (via graph.contradicts), TTL expiry (halfLife + timestampCreated), and confidence/statusLight consistency; emits drift signals on issues.

features.name: Memory Graph Writer
features.description: Idempotent per-packet JSON graph writer with typed nodes (by topic) and edges (packet_contains, ds_detected_from, ce_resolves, als_authorizes).

categories.name: Deterministic Governance Boundary
categories.summary: Governance enforced before execution: default deny, halt on ambiguity, proof-first artifacts.

features.name: Pre-Execution Gate
features.description: Blocks execution unless intent+authority+policy requirements are satisfied.

features.name: Default Deny
features.description: If required conditions cannot be evaluated or are missing, execution is denied.

features.name: Halt on Ambiguity
features.description: Conflicts/unknowns/insufficient provenance trigger a hard fail before routing.

categories.name: Intent Capture & Governance
categories.summary: Intent declared pre-action and bound to execution.

features.name: Intent Packet Schema
features.description: Formal structure for intent, scope, success criteria, TTL, author, authority.

features.name: Intent TTL Enforcement
features.description: Intent expires; expired intent blocks execution.

features.name: Intent Hash Binding
features.description: Intent hash is bound into proof chain and audit pack.

categories.name: Audit-Neutral Decision Logic
categories.summary: Claim→Evidence→Authority binding and context-free audit export.

features.name: Decision Invariants Ledger
features.description: Rules: claim→evidence required, no overwrite, authority precedence, TTL/half-life.

features.name: Claim→Evidence→Authority Validator
features.description: Machine-checkable binding of claims, evidence, and authority references.

features.name: Audit-Neutral Export Pack
features.description: Exports sealed facts + hashes + authority + proof bundle without political narrative.

categories.name: Deterministic Replay & Proof Chain

features.name: Sealed Input Snapshot

features.name: Proof Bundle

features.name: Replay Validation
features.description: Validates proof chain presence and readiness for deterministic replay.

features.name: Authority Ledger
features.description: Append-only ledger of authority actions (key rotations, approvals) with NDJSON persistence and integrity verification.

features.name: Idempotency Guard
features.description: Prevents duplicate execution of already-sealed runs by checking proof chain hashes.
